description: Research and document best practices for Clean Architecture in Python
Analyze dependency direction to ensure it points inward in Clean Architecture
Measure technical debt using SonarQube or similar tool and prioritize fixes
Create benchmarking script to measure tokens/second across different model sizes
Research optimal LoRA rank values for 7B, 13B, and 30B parameter models with evidence
Analyze memory requirements for different quantization levels (Q8, Q6, Q4, Q2) on 30B model
Split TaskPlannerUseCase into TaskAnalyzer and ExecutionPlanner components
Calculate coupling between modules and identify tight coupling issues
Research model quantization tradeoffs and document findings
